jibe.sdk.client.simple.filetransfer
Class FileTransferConnection

java.lang.Object
  jibe.sdk.client.simple.filetransfer.FileTransferConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleApi, SimpleConnection
public class FileTransferConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleConnection

High-level API class, offering convenient set-up of app-to-app file transfers. See jibe.sdk.client.simple for code examples.

Nested Class Summary

Constructor Detail

FileTransferConnection

public FileTransferConnection(Context context,
                              SimpleConnectionStateListener listener)
Constructor. This also starts the asynchronous initialization of the FileTransferConnection.

Important: the application needs to invoke dispose() before this class goes out of scope.

Parameters:
context - Context creating the FileTransferConnection. Needed for auto-acceptance of incoming files.
listener - A reference to the class that has implemented the SimpleConnectionStateListener, which will handle the callbacks associated with connection state changes.
Method Detail

start

public void start(java.lang.String receiverUserId,
                  java.lang.String filePath)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                  java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                  JibeServiceException
Starts a file transfer connection.

Parameters:
receiverUserId - The phone number/SIP URI of user you are trying to connect (e.g. +491235678 or (408) 345-6789)
filePath - full path of the file you are trying to send (for example, '/mnt/sdcard/My Joyn pictures/IMAG0296.jpg')
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the network connection
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the remote userId is not a valid phone number of at least 3 digits
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the SimpleConnection class is not idle any more (e.g. already STARTED or DISPOSED) or not initialized yet
JibeServiceException

public void setTargetDirectory(java.lang.String directory)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                               JibeServiceException

registerFileTransferListener

public void registerFileTransferListener(FileTransferConnection.FileTransferProgressListener listener)
Register the FileTransferProgressListener, which will monitor the progress of the file transfer for this connection.

Parameters:
listener - The reference to the class implementing the FileTransferProgressListener for progress event callbacks.

public void unregisterFileTransferListener()
Unregisters the listener for this connection.
